attributes.action: To ban anyone who believes in mystical beings or myths to be banned from serving on Juries or in any profession that requires the application of reason and logic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who believe in an invisible man in the sky and other such flights of fancy, are clearly not capable of using faculties such as reason. As such they should be banned from serving on juries as their tendencies to believe without basis in fact makes them more likely to make poor decisions. Similiar, jobs such as police detectives, doctors, and civil servant which require the application of reason should have similiar restrictions

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
